creditline: The Alan and Dena Naylor Southeast Asian Art Fund
description: 16 separate leaves between thin wood covers; covers decorated with birds and organic and geometric forms in red on gold; front and back leaves are gold with text on silver leaves
dimension: H.2 x W.21-1/4 x D.5-1/4 in. (overall, closed)
medium: gold, silver and red lacquer, pigment
title: Sutra
